quotes.quote: Alephium is built on stateful UTXO and DAG data structure
quotes.quote2: This combines battle-tested token security, smart contract expressiveness and efficient/practical sharding

quotes.quote: Alephium is light-weight for future scalability
quotes.quote2: PoLW takes into consideration the future energy and hardware requirements
make start-devnet. Docker compose up a devnet for development on daemon

quotes.quote: Compiling ralph contracts is easy using the Alephium CLI. Get the core SDK at npm i @alephium/web3
